title: Weightloss Wisdom from our PNP Retreat
itunes:title: Weightloss Wisdom from our PNP Retreat
description:
Get the Free Course here:
https://phit.click/freecourse

 

A few weeks ago I held a retreat for 130 of my Tribe members.

We always start with tears and hugs, and we always end with tears and hugs.
But the middle is filled with what I call "pearls of wisdom."

Sometimes the pearls come from a Tribe member, and sometimes they come from a coach. And let's be honest, I lay out a few of them myself.

We wrote down more than eighty of them during our three days together. I share some of my favorites in this episode.
